plays.text: Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Hooking Michael Nylander
Penalty to Brian Willsie 2 minutes for Slashing Tony Amonte
Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Phil Housley and Alex Zhamnov
Goal scored by Tony Amonte assisted by Alex Zhamnov and Kyle Calder
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Igor Korolev
Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Peter White 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Ville Nieminen
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Alex Tanguay and Rob Blake
Penalty to Vladimir Chebaturkin 2 minutes for Crosschecking KELLY FAIRCHILD
Goal scored by KELLY FAIRCHILD assisted by RIKU HAHL and Brian Willsie
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Pascal Trepanier and Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Hooking Joe Sakic
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Martin Skoula and Ville Nieminen
Goal scored by Ville Nieminen assisted by Chris Drury and Steve Reinprecht
Goal scored by Stephane Yelle assisted by Eric Messier and Brian Willsie
Penalty to Eric Daze 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Patrick Roy
Penalty to RIKU HAHL 2 minutes for Interference Eric Daze
Penalty to RIKU HAHL 2 minutes for Boarding Mark Bell
Goal scored by Michael Nylander assisted by Alex Zhamnov and Peter White
Penalty to Steve Sullivan 10 minutes for Game Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Pascal Trepanier 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Sullivan
Penalty to Steve Sullivan 5 minutes for Elbowing Pascal Trepanier served by Eric Daze
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Steve Reinprecht and Rob Blake
Penalty to Todd Gill 2 minutes for Holding Steve Poapst
